group_1.textRight: Seiraaa!@Dinner's readyyy!
Comiiing!

group_1.textLeft: Looks delicious!@Think I can order a second helping in advance?

group_1.textRight: Reserving your second helping is cheating!
Thank you for the meal~!
Oh, right.
I've got some forms I'd like you guys to@sign...
Here. It's a career path questionnaire.
They said they give 'em to already-attending@students too.
Yep!@AP courses in the design department.
My big dream is to become a film director,@so...
I want to go to a college or technical school@with a film-related faculty.
To do that, the first thing I wanna do...
Is advance to our high school's design@department...
...Where I can get to know stuff like film@software, while also taking AP classes.

group_1.textLeft: But the AP courses didn't offer much in the@way of degree prep either, did they?

group_1.textRight: Well, that's... true...
Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: Film and design are some of the most@subjective industries you could possibly find.
You'll never get any guarantee of stability@from studying that stuff...
Your whole future will be left up to blind@luck!

group_1.textRight: I mean... you're not wrong about that, but...

group_1.textLeft: Meanwhile, if you get a degree and a steady@job, you'll have a much more stable life.
Please don't get me wrong... I'm not against@you going to university or a technical school.
But the last thing I'm going to do is let you@throw your life away for film, of all things.

group_1.textRight: Throw my...?

group_1.textLeft: At any rate, I am not signing that form.@No way, no how!

group_1.textRight: Got it...
(Yeah, I got it.)
(I get that it's gonna take a lot more than@talking to convince you...!)
(If I want Dad's approval on this, I'm gonna@have to show him how serious I am about it.)
(...I oughta make a movie.)
(I'll make a movie that's so good it'll bring@a tear to Dad's eye,)
(And I'll MAKE him approve of this!)

group_1.textCenter: What the heck?@Is this a real-life alien?!
